info.title: SqlManagementClient
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

get.description: Lists a server's table auditing policies. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the server table auditing policies.

get.description: Gets a server's table auditing policy. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: tableAuditingPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the table auditing policy.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the server table auditing policy.

put.description: Creates or updates a server's table auditing policy. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: tableAuditingPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the table auditing policy.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

200.description: Successfully set the server table auditing policy.

201.description: Successfully created the server table auditing policy.

get.description: Lists a database's table auditing policies. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which the table audit policy is defined.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the database table auditing policies.

get.description: Gets a database's connection policy, which is used with table auditing. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which the connection policy is defined.

parameters.name: connectionPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the connection policy.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the database connection policy.

put.description: Creates or updates a database's connection policy, which is used with table auditing. Table auditing is deprecated, use blob auditing instead.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which the connection policy will be defined.

parameters.name: connectionPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the connection policy.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

200.description: Successfully set the database connection policy.

201.description: Successfully created the database connection policy.

proxyDnsName.description: The fully qualified host name of the auditing proxy.

proxyPort.description: The port number of the auditing proxy.

useServerDefault.description: Whether server default is enabled or disabled.

visibility.description: The visibility of the auditing proxy.

DatabaseConnectionPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a database connection policy.

value.description: The list of database table auditing policies.

DatabaseTableAuditingPolicyListResult.description: Represents the response to a list database table auditing policies request.

useServerDefault.description: Whether server default is enabled or disabled.

DatabaseTableAuditingPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a database table auditing policy.

value.description: The list of server table auditing policies.

ServerTableAuditingPolicyListResult.description: Represents the response to a list server table auditing policies request.

ServerTableAuditingPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a server table auditing policy.

eventTypesToAudit.description: Comma-separated list of event types to audit.

fullAuditLogsTableName.description: The full audit logs table name.

retentionDays.description: The number of days to keep in the audit logs.

storageAccountKey.description: The key of the auditing storage account.

storageAccountResourceGroupName.description: The table storage account resource group name

storageAccountSecondaryKey.description: The secondary key of the auditing storage account.

TableAuditingPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a table auditing policy.

ConnectionPolicyNameParameter.name: connectionPolicyName
ConnectionPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the connection policy.

TableAuditingPolicyNameParameter.name: tableAuditingPolicyName
TableAuditingPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the table auditing policy.
